## Source: amazon-inspector (4bd3404a7cf3642d3e49538ae488a44a564dc5dd94102302ab33814b62e4427a)

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (93a4a2c3ee85b95be606dbf7102484ca257e9ac2edca8344fa870ada1aaad364)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'resto_ui_components' @ 99.99.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
